subject: Football (College)
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Michael Caputo was injured early in Saturday night’s loss to Alabama, and the 20th-ranked Badgers were not sure whether Caputo would be available this weekend against Miami (Ohio).
snippet: Michael Caputo was injured early in Saturday night’s loss to Alabama, and the 20th-ranked Badgers were not sure whether Caputo would be available this weekend against Miami (Ohio).
